fields.name: invoiceNumber
fields.comment: The unique identifier for the invoice

fields.name: customerName
fields.comment: The name of the customer being invoiced

fields.name: invoiceDate
fields.comment: The date the invoice was issued

fields.name: dueDate
fields.comment: The date the invoice is due

fields.name: items
fields.comment: A list of items included in the invoice

fields.name: totalAmount
fields.comment: The total amount of the invoice
